pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correction Factors for Tree Plot Areas Intersected by Stand Boundaries // The German national forest inventory uses angle count sampling, a sampling method first published as `Bitterlich, W.: Die Winkelzhlmessung. Allgemeine Forst- und Holzwirtschaftliche Zeitung, 58. Jahrg., Folge 11/12 vom Juni 1947` and extended by Grosenbaugh (https://academic.oup.com/jof/article-abstract/50/1/32/4684174) as probability proportional to size sampling. When plots are located near stand boundaries, their sizes and hence their probabilities need to be corrected.
